alert.note: Alert for Eddy Plains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued February 20 at 2:21AM MST until February 21 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON FOR VERY HIGH TO EXTREME FIRE DANGER FOR PORTIONS OF SOUTHEAST NEW MEXICO PLAINS AND THE NORTHERN PERMIAN BASIN... The National Weather Service in Midland/Odessa has issued a Fire Weather Watch for Southeast New Mexico plains and the northwest Permian Basin, which is in effect from Monday morning through Monday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Eddy county. * TIMING...Late Monday morning into Monday evening. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Near 15 percent. * RFTI...4 or near critical.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur.
